answers.answer: I think it would be best to go and get a scan done.do u not have any hospital apts at all?if ur baby is measuring well above average size then by right u need to have a scan. U could be at risk for gestational diabetes or other complications.get your blood type checked too.if u are rhesus neg that can cause complications too.u need to organise this as soon as possible.i was told at my 32wk scan that my baby is far too big and i also have alot of fluid than i should.i have been tested for diabetes and i dont have it so it means im at high risk for other complications.i dont want to worry u but it os possible u could be at risk for pre-term labour (before 37wks) get yourself checked out properly by scan and a proper place.dont let the weeks pass.better safe than sorry. Best of luck.
I would get a 2nd opinion....what she told you doesn't sound right.  If you're unable to go to another dr call a physicians office and ask them.  They should be able to advise you correctly.

I am 37 1 day today. The other hospital i used wen i visited my mom @23weeks the midwife there told me if i felt contractions i should go straight to hospital not any clinic cos i won't have my baby @any clinic, wen enquired further she just said to do that way. I have been tested for hypertension,epilepsy, diabetis, cardiac, tb, rpr, rs, tpha, rvd,hb,rpr, rh to mention a few, all sort of risks were tested n all were negative, they kept on testing me on every check-up but nothing has changed, even this last visit everything is still negative
I think pre-term is ruled out since am 37 1day. @jaja65 thanks for the suggestion, maybe i should call a physician. Thanks ladies
Well then its just looking like everything is fine and ur just on the way to having a big healthy baby.best of luck and dont be stressing!
Lol...tinkerbella, thank you. Myb its just nerves...best of luck to the rest of ur pregnancy too. The last days just seem not to move. Sooooo slow!!

question: This is our first baby. So i went to see my midwife @33weeks and she told me that my belly was way too big for my dates, there are no scanners b/c its a public local clinic, they only do sound checks(heartbeat). She also said i should not come bek for a check-up until my 40th week and i've never done any scan. So i dont know what to think of this, could this mean early labour? Could it be that its twins/triplets( have twins in family)? Baby too big? Am so confused cos we have no doctors who do scans around this area, i'have to go 4 6hrs trip to and another 6hrs from a city where scans r done.
title: Help me understand!!
